comments:
Hi,

Sorry for my poor english, i'm french, so i try to explain the best i can.

BASIC INSTALLATION : My first installation is v 1.0 M1.

THEN : I make the last upgrade yesterday the 30th of July from v. 1.0 M1 to M2.

THE PROBLEM : When i open a functions file with more than 5500 (exactly 5622) lines and try to modifiy them, eclipse return errors.

THE ERRORS : a pop-up message with : "Delete" did not complete normally or "End of file".
Randomly if i write something it show reverse typing.
ex : if i type "hello world" it display "dlrow olleh".

OTHER TESTS : I try with a hand made file with more than 6000 lines (duplicate 3 times a 2000 lines file) it's terribly slow, but i don't have error message.

WITH version M1 the big file work fine.

MY COMPUTER : P4 3Ghz RAM : 512 Mo.

Thanks.

Gabriel,
we need the file in order to reproduce the problem, also can you reproduce it under the Milestone 3 release?

we should investigate large files more deeply,

in specific we need to test:
1. mixed files HTML and PHP 
2. HTML only files
3. PHP long files

hello
we have exactly the same trouble than Gabriel. 

We can't give you any file to test it because of confidentiality.

Note that we have this trouble with a 2000 lines PHP file.

Sometimes on smaller files, Eclipse lags and after a few minutes if we try to delete some characters, the Delete error popup appears.

Thanks for your work and your future solution ;-)

David & Romain
No solutions ? Help we need somebody help !

Error opening the editor.
java.lang.NullPointerException
